bug.author: gengtsh
bug.summary: make launch error: wait forever or LogInit: Error: how to setup Two TCP ports
bug.description:
hi, i encounter some weird case : my environment is: server: ubuntu 20.0.04, use opengl remote access from windows 10 using xshell for the TCP port on Ubuntu: <denchmark-link:https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/17346437/86398883-2f4f6680-bc5b-11ea-92c0-ea5cfc2c8b56.png></denchmark-link>
configuration 1, 2 and 3 case: configuration_1:
configuration_2
configuration_3
i got the error: [2020.07.02-17.51.17:432][ 0]LogInit: Warning: Could not initialize SDL: XRandR support is required but not available [2020.07.02-17.51.17:432][ 0]LogInit: - Physical RAM available (not considering process quota): 12 GB (11978 MB, 12265568 KB, 12559941632 bytes) [2020.07.02-17.51.17:433][ 0]LogInit: - VirtualMemoryAllocator pools will grow at scale 1.4 [2020.07.02-17.51.17:433][ 0]LogInit: - MemoryRangeDecommit() will be a no-op (re-run with -vmapoolevict to change) [2020.07.02-17.51.18:320][ 0]LogInit: Using OS detected language (en-US). [2020.07.02-17.51.18:320][ 0]LogInit: Using OS detected locale (en-US). [2020.07.02-17.51.18:320][ 0]LogTextLocalizationManager: No specific localization for 'en-US' exists, so the 'en' localization will be used. [2020.07.02-17.51.18:496][ 0]LogInit: Initializing SDL. [2020.07.02-17.51.19:452][ 0]LogInit: Warning: Could not initialize SDL: XRandR support is required but not available [2020.07.02-17.51.19:452][ 0]LogInit: Warning: FLinuxSplashState::InitSplashResources() : InitSDL() failed, there will be no splash. [2020.07.02-17.51.19:452][ 0]LogInit: Initializing SDL. [2020.07.02-17.51.21:207][ 0]LogInit: Warning: Could not initialize SDL: XRandR support is required but not available [2020.07.02-17.51.21:207][ 0]LogInit: Error: FLinuxApplication::CreateLinuxApplication() : InitSDL() failed, cannot create application instance. [2020.07.02-17.51.21:207][ 0]LogCore: FUnixPlatformMisc::RequestExit(bForce=true, ReturnCode=1) [2020.07.02-17.51.21:207][ 0]LogCore: FUnixPlatformMisc::RequestExit(1) make: *** [Util/BuildTools/Linux.mk:13: launch] Error 1
in the cinfiguration 4&5, no window popup; it looks like then unrealengine is running, but it is stuck in some place for more then 5 hours. configuration_4
configuration_5
can someone help me out from this situation? thanks in advance.

Hi, I think the important ones are these: <denchmark-code>[2020.07.02-17.51.21:207][ 0]LogInit: Warning: Could not initialize SDL: XRandR support is required but not available [2020.07.02-17.51.21:207][ 0]LogInit: Error: FLinuxApplication::CreateLinuxApplication() : InitSDL() failed, cannot create application instance. </denchmark-code>
I think the SDL library has failed. Also it seems the server is up and running.

Thanks <denchmark-link:https://github.com/bernat>@bernat</denchmark-link> , When I turn off the X11 forwarding, this error will be gone. And after a while it will be stuck forever. I also try to install SDL library, but it's failed. Some depends are missing and and then try to install those missings, others are pop up. Even I try apt install - f xxx , it also failed. Can you please provide some suggestions to solve this problem? Thanks . <denchmark-link:#>…</denchmark-link>
On Mon, Jul 6, 2020, 7:28 AM bernat ***@***.***> wrote: Hi, I think the important ones are these:
[2020.07.02-17.51.21:207][ 0]LogInit: Warning: Could not initialize SDL: XRandR support is required but not available [2020.07.02-17.51.21:207][ 0]LogInit: Error: FLinuxApplication::CreateLinuxApplication() : InitSDL() failed, cannot create application instance.
I think the SDL library has failed. Also it seems the server is up and running.
